definition: to put out/to come up with/to make (a choice, decision, proposal, response, comment etc)/to issue (a permit, statement, explanation, apology, reassurance to the public etc)/to draw (conclusion)/to deliver (speech, judgment)/to devise (explanation)/to extract
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc

sentences.english: Drache to confidential action content, therefore has not to clarify in this matter.
sentences.chinese: 卓凱爲了保密行動內容，故一直沒有就此事作出澄清。

sentences.english: Watching from the boat, Mr Kirkconnell is sure Mr Clasen the right decision.
sentences.chinese: 事發時在船上的卡梅倫稱，克拉森作出了正確的決定。

sentences.english: The instantmessaging feature appears to be one part of Microsoft's response.
sentences.chinese: 即時通服務似乎是微軟對此舉動作出迴應的一部分。

sentences.english: Using a grease pencil or equivalent, make alignment marks on the glass and body.
sentences.chinese: 使用油筆或其它等同物，在玻璃與車體上作出標記。

sentences.english: This paper tries to explore the application of fine powder technology to Chinese medicinal herbs and insoluble medicines.
sentences.chinese: 本文就難溶藥物與中草藥微細化技術作出探索性研究。

sentences.english: You"ve made a good decision, and you should stick to it."
sentences.chinese: 你們作出了好的決定，就應該堅決執行下去。

sentences.english: Paley's friends and advisers told him that he had made a huge mistake.
sentences.chinese: 佩利的朋友和顧問告訴他，他作出了巨大的錯誤。

sentences.english: Such an act of cowardice by an officer shames his whole regiment.
sentences.chinese: 一個軍官作出如此膽怯的行爲使整個團都蒙受羞辱。

sentences.english: His greatest contributions came when he was a "senior citizen."
sentences.chinese: 他作出最大了貢獻的時候已是垂暮之年了。

sentences.english: And here I am ranting against somebody that doesn't have a chance to respond.
sentences.chinese: 並且在這裏我還要痛斥那些此時無法作出迴應的人。

sentences.english: We await your decision.; We are expecting you to make a decision.
But a definitive decision on the form of struggle to be pursued had not yet been made.
sentences.chinese: 但是對於所從事的鬥爭的明確方式還沒有作出規定。

sentences.english: With his team of workers, he invented an electric light bulb, the phonograph.
sentences.chinese: 他作出了六千項發明，包括電燈泡，留聲機和油印機。

sentences.english: Every decision to act is an intuitive one .
sentences.chinese: 每一個行動決策都是憑直覺作出的。

sentences.english: he modern, anatomically correct definition of the clitoris was developed by the FFWHCs.
sentences.chinese: 現代解剖學上正確的陰蒂定義爲FFWHCs所作出。

sentences.english: That means when the judge decided how the property would be divided in the divorce.
sentences.chinese: 那就是說離婚時當法官作出決定財產是如何劃分的。

definition: judgment (by a court of law)/to pass judgment on/to sentence
to raise (an issue)/to propose/to put forward/to suggest/to post (on a website)/to withdraw (cash)
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
to declare one's position/to say where one stands
to maintain (that sth is true)/to determine (a fact)/determination (of an amount)/of the firm opinion/to believe firmly/to set one's mind on/to identify with
